name: Tom Swifties Multiple Choice Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'I passed my cardiac checkup with flying colors!' said Tom,....
'This lemonade is too sour!' said Tom,...
'My tires have lost all of their air,' Tom said,...
'I can't remember what I wrote down to buy at the store,' said Tom,...
'I have an entire family of lions in my front yard,' said Tom,...
'I've entered the Iditarod sled dog race,' Tom said, ...
'My barn is filled with hay,' said Tom, ...
'I was able to take away the robber's gun,' said Tom, ...
'I can't see a thing. Get me a flashlight!' said Tom, ...
'I don't have any apples, pears or grapes,' said Tom, ...
